titleStmt.title: A description of the unregenerate and the truly Christian temper or state in a sermon preach'd before the University of Cambridge, on commencement Sunday, in the forenoon, June 30, 1700 / by John Gaskarth ...
titleStmt.author: Gaskarth, John, d. 1732.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the University Press for Edmund Jeffery ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
